headline: Midstream/MLP Q3 2025 Buybacks Surged To Record Level
summary: Quarterly equity repurchases for midstream MLPs and corps reached a new high watermark. Here we take a look at 3Q25 repurchase activity and how record buybacks are amplifying total return.
